text.wmch.title: Where's My Chat History Configuration
text.wmch.desc.time: Should a timestamp in front of all messages show?
text.wmch.desc.timeStr: The text that is used for the timestamp. For dynamic text, search online for 'java date format string'.
text.wmch.desc.timeFormat: The string of ampersands (&) and formatting codes that apply over the time string.
text.wmch.desc.timeColor: The color that's 'filled in' where applicable in the timestamp text.
text.wmch.desc.hover: Should the text that appears when you hover over the timestamp show?
text.wmch.desc.hoverStr: The text that appears when hovering over timestamp text. For dynamic text, search online for 'java date format string'.
text.wmch.desc.counter: Should a message counter show after a message to indicate multiple were sent?
text.wmch.desc.counterStr: The text that's added to the end of a message to indicate multiple duplicates were sent. Must include a $ for the number of duplicates.
text.wmch.desc.counterColor: The color that's 'filled in' where applicable in the counter text, for example '&r' will be replaced with this color.
text.wmch.desc.boundary: Should a boundary line show after using chat, leaving, and then joining again later?
text.wmch.desc.boundaryStr: The text that is shown when a boundary line is inserted into the chat, add ampersands (&) followed by a formatting code to prettify it.
text.wmch.desc.boundaryColor: The color that's 'filled in' where applicable in the boundary text, for example '&r' will be replaced with this color.
text.wmch.desc.saveChat: Should the chat be saved into a log so it can be re-added back into the chat in another game session?
text.wmch.desc.shiftHudPos: Should that chat interface be shifted up about 10 pixels to not obstruct the armor bar?
text.wmch.desc.maxMsgs: The max amount of chat messages allowed to render. Vanilla has this set as 100, maximum allowed is 32,767. Keep in mind the higher the value, the more memory the chat requires.
text.wmch.desc.nameStr: The text that replaces the playername in most references (if present). Vanilla is <$>; no brackets $. $ represents the playername. Only for player messages.
text.wmch.desc.hideUnsecureNotif: Should the 'Not Secure', 'Modified', and 'Unsecure' notifications be removed? If NoChatReports is installed, this instead follows those settings.
